attributes.action: get people off incapability benefits so they can find a job and work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that loads of people such as myself are on incapability benefits and they don't think they desereve the named benefits and wish to find a job (such as myself)
i think the govourment should help people like myself find work.
i am fed up of being restricted in my working hours and was last year turned down to come off by DWP.
